pageContext.claim: “It’s owned by a rich guy for the purposes of giving him power in Washington. It’s really -- I mean, it’s a lobbyist -- I call it the 'Lobbyist Washington Post' -- for Amazon. And he ought to be ashamed of himself, because what they do to his reputation -- I think maybe it’s probably no good anyway.”
pageContext.analysis: The Washington Post is owned by Jeffrey P. Bezos, who also, separately, owns Amazon. The Post does not lobby on behalf of Amazon.
